org.dataconservancy.dcs.util

Class ChecksumGeneratorVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.dcs.util.ChecksumGeneratorVerifier

  • public final class ChecksumGeneratorVerifier
extends Object
    This class provides helper methods that generate and verify a checksum. Methods are provided to generate checksums either as hex strings or as byte arrays. The verifier method can be used with either two String checksums or an input stream and a stored checksum to check against.

    • Method Detail

      • generateMD5checksum

        public static String generateMD5checksum(InputStream inputStream)
        Generates an MD5 checksum for a given file.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the file's InputStream
        Returns:
        String hex checksum

      • generateSHA1checksum

        public static String generateSHA1checksum(InputStream inputStream)
        Generates a SHA1 checksum for a given file.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the file's InputStream
        Returns:
        String hex checksum

      • generateChecksum

        public static String generateChecksum(String algorithm,
                                      InputStream inputStream)
                               throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        A convenience method to take a file and an algorithm (MD5 or SHA1) and generate a checksum with the given algorithm.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the file's input stream
        algorithm - the string representing the algorithm; currently either MD5 or SHA1
        Returns:
        String hex checksum
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorthim string does not represent a known algorithm

      • generateChecksumAsBytes

        public static byte[] generateChecksumAsBytes(String algorithm,
                                             byte[] fileContents)
        A method for generating a checksum for a byte array. The returned value is a byte array, not converted to a string.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - a string representation of the algorithm used
        fileContents - a byte array representing the contents of the file
        Returns:
        byte[] checksum

      • generateChecksumAsBytes

        public static byte[] generateChecksumAsBytes(String algorithm,
                                             InputStream inputStream)
        The method that does the actual work of generating checksums for InputStreams. The caller is responsible for closing the supplied Input Stream after this method returns the digest.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the string representing the algorithm; currently either MD5 or SHA1
        inputStream - the file's input stream
        Returns:
        byte[] checksum

      • verifyChecksum

        public static boolean verifyChecksum(InputStream inputStream,
                                     String algorithm,
                                     String currentChecksum)
                              throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Takes a file and an algorithm (MD5 or SHA1) as well as a current checksum, generates checksum with the given algorithm and verifies it against the given checksum.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the file's InputStream
        currentChecksum - the current checksum
        algorithm - the checksum algorithm
        Returns:
        boolean
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorthim string does not represent a known algorithm
